Posts.Content: Feb 6, 2019 07:49PM HHPsych wrote: I started the TCHP regime on August 2, 2018 and finished Nov 29, 2018. The fatigue continues to get worse each round. I had extreme nausea each round and diarrhea. I felt hungover pretty much the first 2 weeks. I did have to stop taking Perjeta after my third round because it was damaging my liver. I had my third round delayed for 6 weeks between round 2 and 3 (my side would get so painful I'd puke, and my liver numbers were extremely elevated). After stopping Perjeta, my liver numbers went back to normal.
Posts.Title: THCP chemo side effect time line? Glittertits MinusTwo
